column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This is a great place
column2: for both tourists and locals alike. They have very rich collections from all over the world
column3: and you would need much longer than a day to even walk around. Very well curated collections
column4: makes you feel part of a different era. Staff is friendly and helpful. Also very efficient in signing in guests
column5: short lines and even text you when it's your turn. Strongly recommended.
